CY.AppIsBurned: App is burned for the day and cannot be used
CY.AttackCritText: Crit: x2 damage, target armor reduced one tier
CY.AttackFumbleText1: Out of ammo. You also drop the weapon or otherwise make it unusable until an action is spent fixing it.
CY.AttackFumbleText2: Your weapon misfires/breaks. It has to be repaired outside of combat.
CY.AttackFumbleText3: Your weapon explodes or otherwise hurts you for d6 damage and is beyond repair.
CY.BatteredCyRage: CY-RAGE: gain {hp} temporary HP. Attack random targets 2x per round with your most effective weapon. Attacks are DR10, Defense DR14. Ends when Battered, Dead or sedated.
CY.BatteredCriticalInjury: Critical injury: your {bodyPart} is destroyed and has to be replaced or regrown. You are unable to act for {rounds} {roundsWord} then become active with {hp} HP.
CY.BatteredHemorrhageTwoHours: All tests are +4DR the first hour, +6DR the last hour.
CY.BatteredUnconscious: Fall unconscious for {rounds} {roundsWord}, awaken with {hp} HP.
CY.CyRageHelp: Go berserk, gain +d8 temporary HP, and attack random targets 2x round with your most effective weapon. Attacks are DR10 and defense DR14. Don't stop until Battered, Dead, or otherwise sedated.
CY.DefendFumbleText: Fumble: Take x2 damage, armor reduced one tier.
CY.EditAllowedScvmClassesMenuHint: Edit the allowed classes in the character generator.
CY.GlitchesHelpHtml:
• Deal maximum damage
  • Reroll a dice roll
  • Lower damage taken by d6
  • Neutralize a Crit or Fumble
  • Lower one test's DR by -4 (before rolling)
CY.LevelUpHelp: The Game Master decides when a character should improve, after completing missions, getting enough credits, etc.
CY.LevelUpInTheLining: In the lining of your jacket you find
CY.LevelUpJacketMagAndBooster: A forgotten mag and a random booster mod
CY.LevelUpJacketPebbleInfect: A faintly glowing pebble... it infects you!
CY.LevelUpJacketPebbleNothing: A faintly glowing pebble... it does nothing.
CY.Name: Name
CY.ScvmfactoryWarning: Destroy this character, and replace it with a new Scvm? WARNING: This cannot be undone!
CY.SettingsApplyOvercapacityPenaltyHint: +2 STR/AGI DR when carrying more than STR+8 items
CY.SettingsShowChatAdsHint: Whether to show chat message ads
CY.SettingsChatAdDe;lay: Delay between showing chat ads, in seconds
CY.SettingsShowPopupAdsHint: Whether to show popup dialog ads
CY.SettingsPopupAdChanceHint: Percent chance to show a popup ad (0-100)
CY.SettingsPopupAdInsteadHint: Show popup ads instead of original function (vs. in addition to)
CY.SettingsSoundEffectsHint: Play sound effects for various events (combat, etc)
CY.StarvingHelp: No healing when resting, lose d4 HP. All tests are +2DR per restless day.
CY.UseAppFumble: Fumble: app is burned for the day and you trigger a Backlash.
CY.WeakPointsHelp: DR16 attack that deals 2x damage and ignores armor
